content.html: Crypto regulation/stablecoins: UK aims to rein in alternative currencies on.ft.com/3h5wnyM | opinion
content.value: Crypto regulation/stablecoins: UK aims to rein in alternative currencies on.ft.com/3h5wnyM  | opinion

name: Paul Johnston - current focus: moving electrons

content.html: This article is entirely why I don't accept the "cost of moving money around" argument for crypto. That argument appears to be solely based on the US financial system which is, along with so many other things like policing & healthcare, a long way behind other parts of the world
content.value:
This article is entirely why I don't accept the "cost of moving money around" argument for crypto.

That argument appears to be solely based on the US financial system which is, along with so many other things like policing & healthcare, a long way behind other parts of the world
